sk.BusinessLogic.JsonConverter

Class PathTreeCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.BusinessLogic.JsonConverter.PathTreeCreator

  • public class PathTreeCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    Trieda PathTreeCreator konvertuje Java objekty do JSONObject, z ktoreho sa priamo tvori stromova mapa na strane klienta pomocou vizualizacnej JavaScript kniznice D3.js
    See Also:
    TransformToJson

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PathTreeCreator.Node
      Vnorena trieda Node reprezentuje uzol rekurzivne tvoriaceho sa stromu.
